modName: Bonus Damage Perks affect all Weapons
summary: Bone Breaker, Bladesman and Hack and Slash affect all one handed weapons (Swords, Axes, Maces and Daggers) while Deep Wounds, Limbsplitter and Skull Crusher affect all two handed weapons (Greatswords, Battleaxes and Warhammers).
descriptionHtml:
A request by leyasu, these two mods alter the bonus damage perks to affect all weapons of the class. 

In other words, Bone Breaker, Bladesman and Hack and Slash affect all one handed weapons (Swords, Axes, Maces and Daggers) while Deep Wounds, Limbsplitter and Skull Crusher affect all two handed weapons (Greatswords, Battleaxes and Warhammers).

The files are separated for those who only want to affect one of the trees. To get both just install both!

Please note that if you use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1943]No Perk Prerequisites[/url] you need to load this after NPP. This means that the above 6 perks will now need at least 1 level of Armsman or Barbarian to take. This shouldn\'t realistically be a problem since you want at least one rank of those perks anyway.

[b][u]Installation Instructions:[/b][/u]
Click the Downloads Button and then pick the versions you want!
If you download it manually, simply extract it to the Data folder of Skyrim.
